1.Summary:\nThis mobile application is a helper for the party game The Resistance. It allows 5 to 10 persons to play together.\n

2.Background:
The Resistance is a party game of social deduction. It is designed for five to ten players, lasts about 30 minutes, and has no player elimination. The Resistance is inspired by Mafia/Werewolf, yet it is unique in its core mechanics, which increase the resources for informed decisions, intensify player interaction, and eliminate player elimination.

Players are either Resistance Operatives or Imperial Spies. For three to five rounds, they must depend on each other to carry out missions against the Empire. At the same time, they must try to deduce the other players’ identities and gain their trust.
If found any bug, or any idea about the game. Please contact me by sending email from this page.
4.Tips:\nDo not let the team proposal pass so easy! Take some time to watch the votes of other persons.\n

3.Rules:
Approximately one third of the players are randomly chosen as spies,the rest are members of the Resistance.

The spies know who the other spies are, but Resistance members do not.
 Each mission has a leader. The leader proposes a mission team of a certain size, which the group approves by public vote.

 If the group does not approve the mission by a simple majority, leadership passes to the next player.

If the group cannot approve a mission team after five attempts, the spies win.

Once a mission team is chosen, it votes by secret ballot whether the mission succeeds or fails.

Resistance members will always vote for success, but spies have the option of voting for success or failure.

 It usually only takes one spy on the mission team to sabotage a mission, but sometimes the fourth mission requires two.

If three missions succeed, the Resistance wins. If three fail, the spies win. 

And finally, the last, but most important rule of all:

 You are allowed to say anything, to any one, at any time,as long as it is said publicly.
Volume too low, please adjust the volume

We played the board game Resistance by this app. It is quite funny experience!
Spies open your eyes. Look around, and make sure that you know all the other Spies.
Everyone close your eyes and extend your hand into a fist in front of you.
Minions of Mordred, open your eyes and look around so that you know all agents of Evil.
Minions of Mordred (except Oberon), open your eyes and look around so that you know all agents of Evil.
Minions of Mordred, close your eyes.
Minions of Mordred, extend your thumb so that Merlin will know of you.
Minions of Mordred (except Mordred himself), extend your thumb so that Merlin will know of you.
Merlin, open your eyes and see the agents of Evil.
Minions of Mordred, put your thumbs down and re-form your hand into a fist.
Merlin, extend your thumb so that Percival may know of you.
Merlin and Morgana, extend your thumb so that Percival may know of you.
Percival, open your eyes so that you may know Merlin.
Percival, open your eyes so that you may know Merlin and Morgana.
Merlin, put your thumb down and form your hand into a fist.
Merlin and Morgana, put your thumbs down and form your hand into a fist.
Lancelot, open your eyes to reveal your counterpart.
Merlin knows evil, must remain hidden
Good and Evil Lancelots know each other
